name: Will You Be My Friend ?
description:
A simple single-player game.

The target of the game is to make friends. Be quick, Red's on his way too. In the end, the one with the most friends wins the game. 

Please move to FullScreen after starting the game. Otherwise, you may get a problem with Cursor Lock.

This is my first Gamejam project. So, I am open to constructive comments.
